<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

---

Smelling strongly of herbs and pine resin, _merciful balm_ is a thick, sticky paste that can be used to anoint a weapon, granting the weapon the [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) trait for 1 hour.

</column>
